title: Tailscale
description: An application to block ads and internet trackers, for all devices on your home network.
name: pi-hole

env.name: FTLCONF_webserver_api_password
env.label: Web Server Password
env.description: Password for the admin web server. Will be set to a random value if not provided.

env.name: FTLCONF_webserver_port
env.label: Web Server Port(s)
env.description: Ports to be used by the admin web server.

env.name: FTLCONF_dns_port
env.label: DNS port
env.description: Ports to be used by the DNS server.
